name: Fern Factories
description:
In Fern Factory, you play a sentient fern trying to condense resources around you to escape out of an abandoned underground laboratory. Play is a mixture of a platformer and Factorio.

Made for Ludum Dare 41 by Carsen Decker and Rowan Q. Rate us there at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/fern-factories
